troparia: (Tone 4) God of our fathers, You always treat us fairly.* Deprive us not of Your mercy,* but by their prayers direct our lives in peace.
kontakia: (Tone 2) Passing through the swell of waves without being wet,* you mightily engulfed the incorporeal enemies* in the streams of your tears, O godly venerable ones.* Having received the gift of miracles,* pray without ceasing for all of us.
